vulnerability.name: USN-4129-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4129-1 fixed a vulnerability in curl. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM and 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   Thomas Vegas discovered that curl incorrectly handled memory during TFTP  transfers. A remote attacker could use this issue to crash curl, resulting  in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.

statements.status_notes: curl could be made to crash or possibly execute arbitrary code if it incorrectly handled memory during TFTP transfers. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
